title: Pat Condell - Critic of Religion Par Excellence (all videos)
description:
Pat Condell, the famous British comedian, speaks on topical issues such as Christian and Islamic fundamentalism and exposes the corrupt, politically-correct politicians who indirectly support them by undermining democratic values such as freedom of speech through so-called anti-terror legislation, which is often nothing more than an all-out attack on democracy itself.

Listen to this hard-hitting lone voice of sanity in the present quagmire of political correctness, propaganda and religious moronity, which are drowning out the voices of reason in this time of uncertainty. If we don't stop religious fanatics and derailed Western governments now from undermining democratic principles, democracy may soon find itself on the rubbish heap of history!


ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã…â€œPat Condell is unique. Nobody can match his extraordinary blend of suavity and savagery. With his articulate intelligence he runs rings around the religious wingnuts that are the targets of his merciless humour. Thank goodness he is on our side.ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚ï¿½ - Richard Dawkins 

ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã…â€œBrash. Uncompromising. Brilliant. Hilarious. Pat Condell has found a simple formula for success: stating the obvious without restraining himself with the conventions of unwarranted piety. Pat flenses sacred cows, and after slicing away the fat and gristle of tired apologetics and mindless tradition, he exposes the hollow carcass of a culture's hypocrisy...and we laugh.ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚ï¿½ - PZ Myers
